description: Green Energy Priority Impact Update - Q4 2025

backFields.label: ⚡ Q4 2025 Green Energy Impact
backFields.value:
Your Green Energy priority funding helped complete three major solar projects this quarter!

Total LIFT Pool Contribution: $42,150
Your Share: ~$1,247 (33% of your $3,780 certificate)

This pooled funding leveraged $380,000 in additional financing to bring clean energy to our community.

backFields.label: Project 1: Community Solar Garden Phase 2
backFields.value:
Location: Rural Frederick County
Capacity: 150 kW
Status: ✓ Online October 2025

Impact:
• Powers 35 households
• 25 tons CO2 offset/year
• Subscriber program: 50 families
• 20% savings on electric bills

This is the second phase of our successful community solar program, now serving 85 total households!

backFields.label: Project 2: Residential Rooftop Solar (3 Homes)
backFields.value:
Locations: Frederick City
Capacity: 45 kW total (15 kW each)
Status: ✓ Installed September 2025

Impact:
• Powers 3 households (100% of needs)
• 8 tons CO2 offset/year
• Average savings: $1,800/year per home
• All low-income homeowners

These installations were prioritized for income-qualified households with high energy burdens.

backFields.label: Project 3: Nonprofit Solar (Local Food Bank)
backFields.value:
Location: Frederick Community Food Bank
Capacity: 20 kW
Status: ✓ Installed November 2025

Impact:
• Powers refrigeration + operations
• 5 tons CO2 offset/year
• Savings: $2,400/year (reinvested in services)
• Serves 2,000+ families/month

Reducing operating costs allows the food bank to serve more families in need!

backFields.label: Coming Next Quarter (Q1 2026)
backFields.value:
Exciting projects in the pipeline:

• EV Charging Network (4 public stations)
• Home Energy Efficiency Retrofit Program (12 homes)
• Solar Carport (Community Center)
• Battery Storage Pilot (2 installations)

Your continued commitment to Green Energy priority is making a measurable difference in our climate goals!

Detailed impact reports: exchangereserve.org/priorities/green-energy

locations.relevantText: You're near the Community Solar Garden! Your Green Energy priority helped fund this project.
